artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Ebisuya Shōshichi
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension: 14 3/8 × 9 5/8 in. (36.5 × 24.5 cm) (image, sheet, vertical ōban diptych) each sheet
inscription: (Inuta\'s profile in Flower-shaped window) | (Inukawa\'s profile inside fan-shaped window)
markings: censor seals: Murata, Mera; publisher\'s seal: Terifuri chō Ebusuya; {Shita gai}; {Ikkaryakudenshi} (profile of each warrior was written by) {Ryūkatei Shuin ki}; red square in center: calligrapher\'s seal
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Eight Dog Heroes of Satomi (Satomi Hakkenshi no hitori 里見八犬士之一個)
signed: in toshidama cartouche on each sheet: 應需豊國画 {ōju Toyokuni ga}
text: Bottom diptych of four diptychs that combined vertically make an octaptych.
title: Actors Ichimura Uzaemon XIII as Inuta Kobungo Yasuyori (R) and Ichikawa Kodanji IV as Inukawa Shōsuke Yoshitō (L)
